Welcome to the EmbeddedExpertIO Remote Hardware Monitor

EmbeddedExpertIO is a community focused on professional embedded systems software programming. Everyday we try to find the knowledge gaps that exist among current embedded systems developers, then put our minds and years of experience together to create a course to perfectly fill such gaps. If you are new to embedded systems programming our community provides step-by-step courses that will take you from blinky to build your own rtos. If you are an embedded systems developer who wants to specialize in some specific aspect of embedded systems programming this we also provide a wide range of specialization courses to help you master different aspects of embedded firmware development. We look forward to welcoming you to EmbeddedExpertIO.
